_header: But Fortune with her smiling countenaunce strange
Subjects: fortune; mutability; Paston, John II; Paston, John III
_description: Fortune’s mutability — one couplet in a letter from John Paston III to John Paston II, written 1471

BLAdd27445.Transcription:
but fortune with hyr smylyg contenance strangeof all our purpose may
                    make a sodeyn change…
BLAdd27445.Editions:
Davis,  Norman,
                        ed.  
             The Paston Letters and Papers of the Fifteenth Century.
         2 vols. Oxford: Clarendon, 1971, 1976: 1.570.
